Sync Results
Syncs Issued vs Processed Overview

panels.description: Number of times per hour that a node successfully issues an outgoing sync request vs number of times per hour a node successfully processes an incoming sync request (aggregated across all nodes). These should be very similar to indicate that outgoing syncs are processed correctly.
panels.title: Outgoing vs Incoming Sync Successes (Aggregate)

panels.description: Number of times per hour that a node fails when issuing+monitoring an outgoing sync request vs number of times per hour a node fails to process an incoming sync request (aggregated across all nodes). These should be very similar to indicate that outgoing syncs are failing for reasons that are tracked when processing syncs.
panels.title: Outgoing vs Incoming Sync Failures (Aggregate)

panels.description: Number of times per hour that a node successfully issues an outgoing sync request vs number of times per hour a node successfully processes an incoming sync request (aggregated across all nodes). These should be very similar to indicate that outgoing syncs are processed correctly.

targets.legendFormat: Max Syncs Processed Successfully Per Hour (Incoming)
Min Syncs Processed Successfully Per Hour (Incoming)
Max Syncs Issued Successfully Per Hour (Outgoing)
Min Syncs Issued Successfully Per Hour (Outgoing)

panels.title: Outgoing vs Incoming Sync Successes (Outliers)

panels.description: Number of times per hour that a node successfully issues an outgoing sync request vs number of times per hour a node successfully processes an incoming sync request (aggregated across all nodes). These should be very similar to indicate that outgoing syncs are processed correctly.

targets.legendFormat: Syncs Processed Successfully Per Hour (Incoming No-op)

panels.title: Outgoing vs Incoming Sync Successes $host
Syncs Issued vs Processed Per Host

panels.description: Number of times per hour that processing a sync fails for each reason (aggregated across all hosts).
panels.title: Process Sync Failures Per Hour By Reason (Aggregate)

panels.description: Number of times per hour that processing a sync fails for each reason per host.
panels.title: Process Sync Failures Per Hour By Reason (Per Host)
Process Sync - Failure Counts

panels.description: Time that a node spends processing a sync (i.e., a secondary syncing from a primary).
panels.title: Time Spent Processing (Aggregate)

panels.description: Time that a node spends processing a sync (i.e., a secondary syncing from a primary).

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(${percentile:raw}, sum by(host, le) (rate(audius_cn_secondary_sync_from_primary_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$env", host=~"$host", result=~"$process_sync_result"}[5m])))

panels.title: $percentile Time Spent Processing (Per Host)
Process Sync - Duration Overview

panels.description: Time that a node spends processing a sync (i.e., a secondary syncing from a primary) that completes successfully.
panels.title: Time Spent Processing Successful Sync (${percentile})

panels.description: Time that a node spends processing a sync (i.e., a secondary syncing from a primary) that fails to complete for any reason.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(${percentile:raw}, sum by(host, le) (rate(audius_cn_secondary_sync_from_primary_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$env", result!~"succes*", host=~"$host"}[5m])))

panels.title: Time Spent Processing Failed Sync ($percentile)

panels.description: Time that a node spends processing a sync (i.e., a secondary syncing from a primary) that fails to complete for any reason.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(${percentile:raw}, sum by(host, le, result) (rate(audius_cn_secondary_sync_from_primary_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$env", result!~"succes*", host=~"$host"}[5m])))

panels.title: Time Spent Processing Failed Sync By Failure Reason ($percentile Per Host)

panels.description: Time that a node spends processing a sync (i.e., a secondary syncing from a primary) that fails to complete for any reason.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(${percentile:raw}, sum by(le, result) (rate(audius_cn_secondary_sync_from_primary_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$env", result!~"succes*", host=~"$host"}[5m])))

panels.title: Time Spent Processing Failed Sync By Failure Reason ($percentile Aggregate)
Process Sync - Duration by Success/Failure

panels.description: Number of times per hour that Node A issues a sync request to Node B and sees a failure when monitoring Node B for sync completion (aggregated across all hosts)
panels.title: Issue Sync Request Failures Per Hour By Reason (Aggregate)

panels.description: Number of times per hour that Node A issues a sync request to Node B and sees a failure when monitoring Node B for sync completion (aggregated across all hosts)
panels.title: Issue Sync Request Failures Per Hour By Reason (Per Host)
Issue and Wait for Outgoing Sync - Failure Counts

panels.description: Time that a node spends waiting for a sync request to be completed after issuing it (either for write quorum or state machine -- this is different from the node actually processing the sync).

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by(le) (rate(audius_cn_issue_sync_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$env", sync_mode=~"$sync_mode", host=~"$host", result=~"$issue_sync_result", sync_type=~"$sync_type"}[5m])))

histogram_quantile(0.9, sum by(le) (rate(audius_cn_issue_sync_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$env", sync_mode=~"$sync_mode", host=~"$host", result=~"$issue_sync_result", sync_type=~"$sync_type"}[5m])))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le) (rate(audius_cn_issue_sync_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$env", sync_mode=~"$sync_mode", host=~"$host", result=~"$issue_sync_result", sync_type=~"$sync_type"}[5m])))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le) (rate(audius_cn_issue_sync_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$env", sync_mode=~"$sync_mode", host=~"$host", result=~"$issue_sync_result", sync_type=~"$sync_type"}[5m])))

panels.title: Time Spent Waiting (Aggregate)

panels.description: Time that a node spends waiting for a sync request to be completed after issuing it (either for write quorum or state machine -- this is different from the node actually processing the sync).

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(${percentile:raw}, sum by(host, le) (rate(audius_cn_issue_sync_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$env", sync_mode=~"$sync_mode", host=~"$host", result=~"$issue_sync_result", sync_type=~"$sync_type"}[5m])))

panels.title: $percentile Time Spent Waiting (Per Host)
Issue and Wait for Outgoing Sync - Duration Overview

panels.description: Time that state machine jobs (recurring syncs) or write quorum (manual syncs) wait for a sync request to be completed on the secondary that they issued it to. This only counts when the sync was successful, including if another sync was required (e.g., the sync completed but the clock value on the secondary didn't fully catch up to the primary).

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(${percentile:raw}, sum by(host, le) (rate(audius_cn_issue_sync_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$env", result=~"success_mode_disabled|success_secondary_caught_up|success|success_secondary_partially_caught_up", sync_mode=~"$sync_mode", host=~"$host", sync_type=~"$sync_type"}[5m])))

panels.title: Time Spent Waiting For Successful Sync ($percentile)

panels.description: Time that state machine jobs (recurring syncs) or write quorum (manual syncs) wait for a sync request to be completed on the secondary that they issued it to. This only counts when the sync was unsuccessful.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(${percentile:raw}, sum by(host, le) (rate(audius_cn_issue_sync_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$env", result=~"failure_secondary_failure_count_threshold_met|failure_primary_sync_from_secondary|failure_issue_sync_request|failure_secondary_failed_to_progress|failure_missing_wallet", sync_mode=~"$sync_mode", host=~"$host", sync_type=~"$sync_type"}[5m])))

panels.title: Time Spent Waiting For Failed Sync ($percentile)
Issue and Wait for Outgoing Sync - Duration By Success/Failure

list.description: Outcome that Node A sees when it issues a sync request to Node B and polls it for completion (or times out)
list.label: Issue Sync Result
list.name: issue_sync_result

list.description: Outcome of the node attempting to execute a sync
list.label: Process Sync Result
list.name: process_sync_result
